compound: Nabiximols (add-on to baclofen, tizanidine, or other)
participants: 276 MS patients on existing antispasticity therapy
notes: Nabiximols as Add-On Therapy for MS Spasticity: Real-World Enriched RCT
abstract: Add-on nabiximols: Additional 24% improvement over existing therapy vs placebo add-on: 11% (p<0.001)
